name: GooglePlayPromote
description: Promote an app from one release track to another
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Play service connection that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceAccountKey
inputs.label: JSON key path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON file provided by Google Play that includes the service account's identity you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: Package name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique package identifier (e.g. com.foo.myapp) that you wish to promote.

inputs.name: versionCode
inputs.label: Version Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version code of unique package identifier that you wish to promote. If none is provided, the latest version on the source track will be promoted.

inputs.name: sourceTrack
inputs.label: Source track
inputs.helpMarkDown: The track you wish to promote from.

inputs.name: destinationTrack
inputs.label: Destination track
inputs.helpMarkDown: The track you wish to promote to.

inputs.name: rolloutToUserFraction
inputs.label: Roll out release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Promote the release to a percentage of users. Use the 'Google Play - Increase Rollout' task to increase the rollout within a track.

inputs.name: userFraction
inputs.label: Rollout fraction
inputs.helpMarkDown: The percentage of users the specified APK will be released to for the specified 'Destination track'. It can be increased later with the 'Google Play - Increase Rollout' task.

messages.InvalidAuthFilewithName: %s was not a valid auth file
messages.JsonKeyFileNotFound: The service account JSON key file could not be found.
messages.EndpointNotFound: The service connection could not be found.
messages.InvalidVersionCode: Version code should be a positive integer
messages.ReturnedNullEdit: Failed to promote apk: promote operation returned null
